On a Wednesday is a taking a few weeks off to focus on our new website. We'll be back soon with some surprises!

On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Kenshasa

 Prospect Park

⏲ 8:51 a.m. on Wednesday, October 23

What are you doing today?

Today I’m walking my dog in the park, I have a couple of appointments, and I have a meeting later on this evening. I am an international distributor of organic coffee and teas. I have meetings today around that.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Oh actually this is one of my favorite parts of the day. Just getting out into the fresh air, the morning air, before all the fumes get into it. Having Fudge [the dog] interact with other pets, it’s just wonderful. I enjoy it very much.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Tomorrow I have a workshop. I’m a psychologist and I do workshops on stress management. So I have a workshop tomorrow at 8:30 in the morning.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
